Add On Load.description: Adds event handlers to the Subgrid OnLoad event event.

Get Entity Name.description: Gets the logical name of the entity data displayed in the grid.

Get Fetch Xml.description: Gets the FetchXML query that represents the current data, including filtered and sorted data, in the grid control.

Get Grid.description: Get access to the Grid available in the GridControl (gridContext).

Get Grid Get Rows.description: Returns a collection of every GridRow in the Grid.

Get Grid Get Rows Get.description: Returns a GridRow object from the collection of GridRows

Get Grid Get Selected Rows.description: Returns a collection of every selected GridRow in the Grid.

Get Grid Get Total Record Count.description: Returns the total number of records that match the filter criteria of the view, not limited by the number visible in a single page.

Get Grid Type.description: Gets the grid type (grid or subgrid).

Get Relationship.description: Gets information about the relationship used to filter the subgrid.

Get Url.description: Gets the URL of the current grid control.

Get View Selector.description: Use this method to access the ViewSelector methods available for the grid control.

Get View Selector Get Current View.description: Gets a reference to the current view.

Get View Selector Is Visible.description: Returns a boolean value to indicate whether the view selector is visible.

Open Related Grid.description: Displays the associated grid for the grid.

Refresh Ribbon.description: Refreshes the ribbon rules for the grid control.

Remove On Load.description: Removes event handlers from the Subgrid OnLoad event event.
